Name: Mithril
Description: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project, "Second Coming of Solaris"...
QuestDesc: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project, "Second Coming of Solaris"...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me explain our job today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In this chapter, they ventured all the way to the North and reached Mt. Moore, preparing to meet the final enemy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Before their enemy showed up, the air of Mt. Moore had already chilled the protagonist to the bone.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It goes: "...Obscuring the moonlight, black clouds even made the Mithril on the hills lose its sheen..."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Everything seemed to be flowing, filling my lungs like condensed ink. As I took my breaths, I was dragged into darkness further."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This part can never cease to impress me with the howling sense of despair, even after all of my repeated readings.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't help but wonder, what would induce such a sensational scene? And this Mithrill... what does it look like?

Options.PlotLineKey: We need a reference for this.
It says it shines bright like the moon.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Indeed. The black clouds had an overwhelming presence as they had swallowed the glow of the moon and minerals.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Samples of Mithrill will help improve the mental image of this chapter, I believe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you happen to come across some samples, feel free to drop by.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow. This mineral surely fits the depiction of the Mirthril. I'll hand it over to the dev team right now!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When the black clouds veil the moon... This is the perfect trigger!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some time passed while Maqi was away to hand over the item...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you. That wraps up today's work!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: See you tomorrow, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, maybe you should ask the owner of Huaipu Mining Firm. He is a knowledgeable mineral expert.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since it's about the Mithril, I suggest you go ask for his advice.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Second Coming of Solaris? I could spare little interest for these casual reads of you youngsters...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...though I do know a thing about this Mithril.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A translucent mineral called Lampylumen would produce an azure shine that makes it even brighter in the dark.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm assuming the Mithril probably originates from the Lampylumen.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You've mentioned its writer, Karl, right? I would like to have a little chat with a mineral expert like him.

Options.PlotLineKey: I don't know if it's possible.
He is out far in the New Federation now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *sigh* What a shame... As you get older, you'd realize how hard it is to meet someone who shares your passion.

Options.PlotLineKey: Anyway, do you have some Lampylumens available?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What a coincidence. I happen to keep a Lampylumen remnant left by the previous guest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Lampylumen is a specialty mineral only found in the caves of the Panyan mountains.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But if it's useful to you, I'll not reserve it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're welcome, hehe! Business is all about honesty and I'd like to maintain a good relationship with my customers.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do remember to come over next time! Huaipu Mining Firm has the best mineral salt and petrolatum.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Take it. I know you have a busy schedule today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Second Coming of Solaris? I could spare little interest for these casual reads of you youngsters...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...though I do know a thing about this Mithril.
